name: Puzzle Zoo
tag_list: toys, kids-toys, boy-toys, girl-toys, action-figures, atuffed-animals, puzzles, jigsaw-puzzle
description: Retail toy store chain and online toy
overview:
Puzzle Zoo is a unique toy store for kids of all ages. Puzzle Zoo has 6 stores, 5 stores are located in Southern California. Started a an exclusive Puzzle Store in Santa Monica, today has grew up to 6 stores in 2 different States.

Puzzle Zoo Toys store has the vision for the fututre to become national re-known toy store and invest in creating its brand. Their store locations are prime mall and retail street setting high traffic stores. Santa Monica 3rd Street store is a great example of their high traffic prime location Street store. Puzzle Zoo South Coast Plaza store is also a great example for their Shopping Mall store. South Coast Plaza is one of Southern California busiest and highest traffic and rent per sqft shopping mall. World famous for its brands, restaurants and etc.

Puzzle Zoo carries action figure toys, superhero characters, plush animals, stuffed animal toys, educational kids toys, card games, board games, art and craft toys, lego, barbie, dolls, electronic remote vehicles, painting and playing games and supplies and many more.
